title: The Francilee Show
description: Crystal Cove’s favorite cooking show with the queen of butter and bacon, Francilee Jackson.
quote: A lot of you folks at home been asking if I worry about my recipes aren’t the healthiest. All I got to say is, I ain”t no doctor, y’all.
alt1: Francilee with a cutting board of veggies
alt3: Francilee holding up a box of her cornbread stuffing
alt4: Francilee laughing, holding a bacon-wrapped stick of butter
